tool_description:
This API provides latest NAV as well as Historic Data of Mutual Fund Schemes with response time in milliseconds.
1. Get NAV based on scheme Codes and dates - multiple entries supported
2. Get Unique Schemes for scheme suggestion API
3. Get latest nav based on schemes Codes - multiple scheme codes supported.
4. Latest business News
name: Mutual Fund Nav Info and Historic Data
title: Mutual Fund Nav Info and Historic Data
tool_name: Mutual Fund Nav Info and Historic Data

api_list.name: Get Latest Nav of Schemes - multiple scheme Codes supported
api_list.description: Get Latest Navs using comma separated scheme codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mutual-fund-info.p.rapidapi.com/ri/v1/investment/scheme/latestNav"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mutual-fund-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get scheme Nav by date and schemeCode - Multiple schemeCodes supported
api_list.description: Get scheme Nav by date and schemeCode(AMFI Codes) - Multiple schemeCodes supported
